name: DemonSpawn: Chicken of the Depths
description:
It doesn't quite look like other eggs, but it is yours. How far will you go to keep it alive?

Controls

W, A, S, D to move

Q to interact

I to toggle inventory

E to pick up item

Click on an item in inventory to use it

Download

Download the correct file for your operating system. Uncompress the zip file. For MacOS, simply double click the application. For Windows, go into the into the directory and run DemonSpawn.exe.

Credits

Thank you to Minim4listPH for the beautiful tile set. 

We used three fantastic code libraries: bump.lua, Simple Tiled Implementation, and classic.

All other assets and code are our own!

Platform

We used LÖVE, Tiled, Photoshop, and MuseScore.
